name: Lycanroc

passive.name: Pack Howl
passive.effect: Once during your turn, for each Rockruff on your Bench, you may reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of them have Lycanroc in the name, you can evolve only one Rockruff immediately. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

flavor: These loyal dogs were raised and cared for during the day. Their healthy upbringing has given them a bright, playful personality.
